data.text: @TelegraphNews Fantasic to see,  as there far to many celebrities that see me too as nothing more then a photo op and an opportunity to run around in black designer dresses at award nights
@Paul_Neptune @TelegraphNews @EmmaWatson That’s exactly what I was trying to say tho was not eloquent or brave enough to do so. Thanx for saying what I was thinking.

@TelegraphNews Again though focus is on Men. Harassment and abuse of power happens regardless of gender, race or sexual orientation and is in the eye of the recipient. Whilst men are currently being singled out there should be a wider acknowledgement of a bigger issue.
@TelegraphNews it should be treat others how you would like to be treated campaign

@TelegraphNews I really love philanthropy. & sorry 2B the devils advocate. But why did it take wealthy women victimised by sexual harassment for @EmmaWatson to donate £1m to charity. I know of a few million kids starving way before this shite went down
@TelegraphNews Hopefully this generous donation will be put to good use with this campaign.
